Tune in to the inaugral episode of Sam Knot's The Metaphoreal: "Psychedelic Poetry Au Naturel" from deepest Normal-dy":Â 

The Metaphoreal s01e01: "Auld Hahaha Lows" at archive.org

Produced for Spiritplants Radio, the show is a mix of poetry and story readings, as well as spontaneous rambles and field recordings, sometimes blended with or punctuated by music (usually my own, more or less experimental stuff).

The first season will contain 8 episodes, structured according to the old wheel of the year (basically the solstices, equinoxes, and the points roughly in between). In other words: I made this episode around Halloween/Samhain, so it has a bit of a late autumn vibe.

Warring spiders, the odd giggle, birdsong, churchbells, unicorns, magic mushrooms - what's not to like? Apart from me, of course.
